thread.title: Jeremy Kyle tells guest he's 'got the smallest penis in the world' before asking Security Steve VERY crude question
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle tells guest he's 'got the smallest penis in the world' before asking Security Steve VERY crude question

author: Hayley Minn
title: Jeremy Kyle tells guest he's 'got the smallest penis in the world' before asking Security Steve VERY crude question
text:
TV Jeremy Kyle tells guest he's 'got the smallest penis in the world' before asking Security Steve VERY crude question Matt was on the Jeremy Kyle Show with his ex Judith - who was insisting he's the father of her baby Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jezza asks security guard Steve to tally up guest's conquests Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jeremy Kyle is often rude to the guests on his show. 
But today, the ITV host shocked when he got very crude with both the guests – AND his camera crew, as well as Security Steve. 
Matt was on the Jeremy Kyle Show with his ex Judith – who was insisting he was the father of her baby, despite having had unprotected sex with three other men in the same month. 
Before coming on to join Matt, Judith was shouting from the sidelines, “he’s got a chipolata”! Jeremytold a guest he has "the smallest penis in the world" (Photo: ITV) Matt was shocked (Photo: ITV) Until he found out it came from his ex Judith (Photo: ITV) Judith was insistent Matt was the dad (Photo: ITV) Her mum got involved too (Photo: ITV) 
And then, reading out her notes, Jeremy told Matt: “You’d be a rubbish dad and you’ve got the smallest penis in the world!” 
He quickly insisted he was just the messenger, and these weren’t his thoughts, however. 
But then, shocked by Judith‘s admission she’d slept with four different men in one month, Jeremy went one step further and started asking Security Steve how many people he’d slept with ever. 
As the rest of his camera crew backed away in fear, he started questioning them too. Then Jezza started asking his crew how many people they'd slept with (Photo: ITV) He even asked Security Steve! (Photo: ITV) But he wasn't preparing to be asked back (Photo: ITV) 
But he wasn’t expecting one of them to ask him back. 
Shocked, but refusing to answer the question, Jeremy backed off immediately! 
Meanwhile, Judith was insisting Matt is the father of her child because he “looks the spitting image of her” and isn’t jealous of his new girlfriend Sarah “because she’s a hippo”. 
It turned out Matt isn’t the father of her baby, and Judith is still in the dark who the father really is. Judith never did find out who the father of her baby is (Photo: ITV) But Matt and Sarah are happy (Photo: ITV) 
Matt and Sarah are still together and are happy. 
*The Jeremy Kyle Show continues on ITV1 weekdays at 9.25am Like us on Facebook
